mapper.select: SELECT id, comments AS dailyComment, badge AS useComplimentBadge, profile_id AS profileId, TO_CHAR(comment_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS readsDay FROM COMMENTS WHERE profile_id = #{profileId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS (ID, COMMENT_DATE, COMMENTS, BADGE, PROFILE_ID) VALUES (comments_seq.NEXTVAL,#{readsDay}, #{dailyComment}, #{useComplimentBadge}, #{profileId})
